Metadata.title: CarlosEduJS
Metadata.description: A showcase of my best projects, demonstrating my skills in web development.

About.title: About me
About.content: I'm a front-end developer passionate about turning ideas into smooth and intuitive interfaces. I have a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I'm currently diving deeper into React and Next.js. I enjoy building dynamic applications that provide great user experiences, always eager to learn and take on new challenges along the way.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.content: Every line of code has a story to tell. Take a look at my projects and see how I bring ideas to life, creating digital experiences that make an impact.
